A

Adds the downloader manager to the Gateway.

Adds the Downloaders Manager to the gateway.

The addToIndex method is used to add a term and a url to the inverted index.

The addToLinkedPage method is used to add a url to the linkedPage.

The addToUrls method is used to add a url and its associated link to the pageLinks.

availableIds - Variable in class Gateway
Set of available IDs to reuse.

B

Barrel - Class in Unnamed Package
The Barrel Class implements the interface IBarrel It is responsible for storing all the information, such as, the inverted index, the linked pages and the top 10 searches It also listens for multicast messages from the Gateway and updates the information accordingly
Barrel() - Constructor for class Barrel
The Barrel constructor is used to create a new barrel.
barrels - Variable in class Gateway
List of active barrels.
bindGatewayToRegistry() - Method in class Gateway
Binds the Gateway to the RMI registry.
brlCount - Variable in class Gateway
Current number of barrels.
BrlMessage(String) - Method in class Gateway
Messages from the barrels to be printed on the log.
BrlMessage(String) - Method in interface IGatewayBrl
Sends error messages from the Barrels to print on the Gateway log.

C

citation - Variable in class Downloader
Citation information for the document being downloaded.
Client - Class in Unnamed Package
The Client class represents a client application for interacting with the Googol Search Engine Gateway.
Client() - Constructor for class Client
Constructs a new Client object and connects it to the Gateway via rmi.
clients - Variable in class Gateway
List of connected clients.
connectToGateway() - Method in class Client
Connects to the RMI gateway by looking up the server's remote object.
connectToGateway() - Method in class Downloader
Connects to the Gateway using RMI.
createDownloaderThreads() - Method in class Downloader
Creates and starts downloader threads.

D

deleteQueueFile() - Method in class Gateway
Deletes the queue file used by the downloaders manager.
displayResults(String, Scanner) - Method in class Client
Displays the search results in pages of 10 results each.
displaySubLinks(String, Scanner) - Method in class Client
Displays the sub-links in pages of 10 results each.
DlMessage(String, String) - Method in class Gateway
Messages from the downloaders manager to be printed on the log.
DlMessage(String, String) - Method in interface IGatewayDl
Sends error messages from the Downloaders Manager to print on the Gateway log.
download(String) - Method in class Downloader
Adds a URL to the download queue.
download(String) - Method in interface IDownloader
Adds the URL to the URLs queue.
Downloader - Class in Unnamed Package
The Downloader class implements the IDownloader interface and is responsible for downloading web pages, extracting information such as title, citation, links, and keywords, and then broadcasting this information via multicast to the barrels.
Downloader() - Constructor for class Downloader
Constructs a Downloader object with the given multicast address and port.
downloaderManager - Variable in class Gateway
The downloader manager responsible for handling download requests.

E

extract(String) - Method in class Downloader
Extracts information such as title, citation, links, and keywords from the given URL.

F

findSubLinks(String) - Method in class Barrel
The findSubLinks method is used to find the links pointing to a given link.
findSubLinks(String) - Method in class Gateway
Finds the sub-links of a given URL by choosing a random barrel to perform the operation.
findSubLinks(String) - Method in interface IBarrel
Finds sub-links related to the specified URL in the indexed data stored in the Barrel.
findSubLinks(String) - Method in interface IGatewayCli
Finds sub-links for a given URL.
findSubLinks(Scanner) - Method in class Client
Finds sub-links for a given URL and displays the results.

G

Gateway - Class in Unnamed Package
The Gateway class implements the remote interfaces IGatewayCli, IGatewayDl, and IGatewayBrl.
Gateway() - Constructor for class Gateway
Constructs a Gateway object.
getActiveBarrels() - Method in class Gateway
Gets the active barrels by returning the IDs of the active barrels.
getActiveBarrels() - Method in interface IGatewayCli
Gets the active barrels.

The getId method is used to get the id of the barrel.
getId() - Method in interface IBarrel
Retrieves the ID of the Barrel.

The getLockObject method is used to get the lock object for a given filename to syncronize.

The getTop10Searches method is used to get the top 10 searches.
getTop10Searches() - Method in class Gateway
Gets the top 10 searches by choosing a random barrel to perform the operation.
getTop10Searches() - Method in interface IBarrel
Retrieves the top 10 searches performed in the indexed data stored in the Barrel.
getTop10Searches() - Method in interface IGatewayCli
Gets the top 10 searches.

I

IBarrel - Interface in Unnamed Package
The interface for a Barrel, which represents a component of the search engine responsible for storing and managing indexed data.
IClient - Interface in Unnamed Package
The interface for a Client of the search engine system.
id - Variable in class Barrel
The id of the barrel
IDownloader - Interface in Unnamed Package
The interface for the Downloaders Manager in the search engine system.
IGatewayBrl - Interface in Unnamed Package
This interface allows the Barrels to communicate to the Gateway via RMI.
IGatewayCli - Interface in Unnamed Package
This interface allows the Clients to connect to the Gateway via RMI.
IGatewayDl - Interface in Unnamed Package
This interface allows the Downloaders Manager to connect to the Gateway via RMI.
indexURL(Scanner, IGatewayCli) - Method in class Client
Indexes a URL by sending it to the gateway for processing.

Initializes the logger for the Gateway.

Checks if a given string is a valid URL.
